dict.string: tell application "Terminal" activate tell application "System Events" keystroke "t" using command down end tell do script command in front window end tell
tell application "Terminal" activate do script command end tell
tell application "Terminal" activate do script command in front window end tell
tell application "iTerm2" tell (current window) tell (current session) of (create tab with default profile) write text command end tell end tell end tell
tell application "iTerm2" tell (current session) of (create window with default profile) write text command end tell end tell
tell application "iTerm2" tell (current session) of (current window) write text command end tell end tell
